For a number of infectious diseases, immunity induced by vaccinations wanes over time[2]. Not only so, there are also findings that suggest the duration of immunity diminished earlier than the official recommendation suggests for yellow fever, mumps, pertussis and meningococcal disease,[3]. One potential explanation of weaning immunity is that life-long immunity is caused by continuous exposure to the pathogens during normal daily life[4]. These exposures act like a booster that reinforce the immune response of the body against specific infections. Potentially, lacking influenza virus-specific plasma cells in the bone marrow may also contribute to not being able to have life-long immunity [2]. Influenza viruses are also able to mutate during replication. For every 1-2 years there could be enough genetic and serological alterations that a reformation of the vaccine is required [2].

2. Gu X, Plotkin S, Edwards K, Sette A, Mills K, Levy O et al. Waning Immunity and Microbial Vaccines—Workshop of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases. Clinical and Vaccine Immunology. 2017;24(7).

我個邏輯係：
1. 香港疫情屬輕度，帶足口罩洗手後中招風險並不高
2. 打左之後機率計係可以更大幅降低中招風險，但係講緊由99.9%（帶足口罩洗手）唔中，變到99.999%唔中，其實並不重要。
3. Bnt 既mRNA技術係幾十年來都未用過係人身上既技術，世界上無人知道佢長遠影響會點
4. 未打，要唔要帶口罩洗手？要。咁打左呢？咪一樣要。出國要唔要隔離？咪一樣要。你大厦有人中左，你要唔要入隔離營？咪一樣要。打左，唔會令生活有任何方便左
5. 打既話，就肯定要面對副作用風險如肌肉痛，發燒，和各種問題。
6. 或者過些時間會有些更有效更安全既疫苗，如呢期無邊隻疫苗係話能針對南非變種，但將來實會有
7. Herd immunity 係一個myth, 沒有根據話今次呢隻病一定會發生。
